scripts.render-postbuild: npm install --prefix frontend --production=false && cd /opt/render/project/src && npm run build
scripts.this_is_a_comment: the command below is, for some reason, what makes this be able to work with github pages right now. it clears cache for gh-pages
scripts.deploy: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force './node_modules/.cache/gh-pages'" && npm run predeploy && gh-pages -d dist
scripts.send: git add . && powershell -Command "$commitMessage = Read-Host 'Commit message:'; git commit -m $commitMessage; git push origin main; npm run deploy
